# collection

Get NFT Collection Data

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/nft collection slug
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| slug | NFT collection slug (e.g., cryptopunks) | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/nft collection slug: bent
```
